Attacks.Name: Pound
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, Igglybuff gains power equal to the damage dealt.

Attacks.Name: Sweet Kiss
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled, the target gains the Stagger special condition.

Superpowers.Name: Competitive Spirit
Superpowers.Effect: If Igglybuff is attacked and suffers no damage, it gains 1 power.

Superpowers.Name: Sing
Superpowers.Effect: Choose an enemy character within Range 2. That character gains the Stun special condition.

Attacks.Name: Fairy Wind
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled, the target is Pushed S.

Superpowers.Name: Healing Song
Superpowers.Effect: Remove 1 damage from Igglybuff and each allied character within Range 2.

Superpowers.Name: Evolution
Superpowers.Effect: Replace this character with a Jigglypuff character of the same injured status. The new character begins with damage equal to the damage on this character and power equal to the power on this character.
